text: iṟaivaṉiṉ oḷiyaik koṇṭu pūmi pirakācikkum. (Avaravarkaḷiṉ) tiṉacarik kuṟippu (avaravarkaḷ muṉ) vaikkappaṭṭuviṭum. Napimārkaḷaiyum, ivarkaḷuṭaiya (maṟṟa) cāṭciyaṅkaḷaiyum koṇṭuvarappaṭṭu, avarkaḷukkiṭaiyil nītamākat tīrppaḷikkappaṭum. (Avarkaḷuṭaiya naṉmaiyil oru aṇuvaḷavēṉum kuṟaittō, pāvattil oru aṇuvaḷavēṉum atikappaṭuttiyō) avarkaḷ aniyāyam ceyyappaṭa māṭṭārkaḷ
